description.english: Gain your freedom from the dreaded playpen!
Put the rings on the tower.
Drive the RC car for 1 minute.
Put the pacifier in your face!
Pull all the books off the shelf.
Shoot the punching toy in the head with the bow.
Put the PBJ in the VCR!
Tear a page from your sisterâ€™s diary.
Grab and use the toy robot.
Make your sisterâ€™s computer Blue Screen.
Crawl a baby's mile in your sister's slippers.
Your sister has some big shoes to fill!
Get the astronaut onto the moon!
Send the truck on it's way!
Put the DeLorean on the track.
Put the motorcycle on the track.
Give the soccer ball a toss.
Crawl a baby's mile in your father's loafers.
Drop the ring into the volcano.
Launch the duck from their little pond.
Toss the boat into the water.
Throw the toothbrush into the toilet.
Answer the cellphone, don't worry about taking a message.
Give the catnip to the cat.
Make some noise by tossing some pots and pans!
Grab the cheese without getting snapped.
Shred a sick track with the matching game!
Splish, splash, start a bubble bath.
Try not to stay within the lines when you color with crayons.
Use the floppy to make a copy.
Try to play a game...while playing the game?
clean items around the house, one flush at a time.
Use the convenient storage buckets around the house, I think the adults called them trash cans?
Eliminate some trash by recycling it back to the floor!
Plug up the bathtub to create your own world of water!
Cash in on your sister's investment by breaking her piggy bank!
Prepare for lift off into the Solar System!
I pitty the fool that can't get my van on the road!
Prove you can shoot like Robin Hood!
Take out the competition in MAC-MAN.
Master all the latest console video games!
Get 3 points in one game on the hi-tech tennis simulator your sister has on her PC!
Try a bit of everything there is to eat!
Make it through the second lap with the RC Car!
Grab the dice and try for the lowest score you can!
Roll a lucky number 7 on the dice!
Put car keys in the toilet
Try the newest handheld game device!
Help guide Albert Onion through a grand adventure!
Find a way to open the mystery box!
"Life is better, down where it's wetter!"
